Warehouses & Logistics

Hearing Screening for Warehouses & Logistics Centres

Workplace Hearing Tests for Busy Logistics Operations

Get in Touch Today

Warehouses and logistics centres combine vehicle movement, alarms, conveyors, loading bays, and constant operational noise. Over time, this environment can affect hearing, communication, and overall workplace safety.

Our warehouse hearing screening service helps logistics employers manage risk, protect staff wellbeing, and maintain safe, efficient operations.

Why Hearing Screening Is Important in Warehousing

Background Noise

Constant background noise from forklifts and machinery

Safety Critical

Clear hearing is critical for safety signals and alarms

Accident Prevention

Prevents accidents caused by reduced awareness

Proactive Surveillance

Supports proactive health surveillance programmes

What Our Hearing Screening Includes

Noise-Exposure Questionnaire

Understanding workplace noise exposure

Ear Health Inspection

Professional otoscopic examination

Audiometric Hearing Test

Comprehensive hearing assessment

Confidential Employee Results

Private results for each worker

Employer Compliance Documentation

Complete records for your business

Testing is efficient, discreet, and designed to work around shift patterns.

Who This Service Is For

Warehouse Operatives

Forklift & HGV Drivers

Dispatch & Loading Teams

Supervisors & Managers
